summary:
Adapt Sleek Steel to Muscular Women body.
Original Mod required.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/2711/sleeksteellogo.png[/IMG][/center]


[font=\"Century Gothic\"]
Version: 1.0.0a
Date: 03/22/2013
Category: Armours
Requirements: Skyrim, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8873]Muscular Women[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32521]Muscular Women - Armours[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065]Sleek Steel Replacer[/url]
Recommended: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=44]Female Muscle Mod[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
Author: Elmanouche



[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/3778/detailsr.png[/IMG]

This mod convert the Sleek Steel armour to Muscular Women body.
Original mod is required for textures !
[center][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065]SleekSteel Replacer[/size][/b][/url][/center]

My package is NMM ready with installation script.

Please upload screen-shots if you like, I got lazy on that side.

[color=orange]Update ![/color] Fixed folder naming in package. Replacer_NordAndOrc wouldn\'t work.


[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/8527/installp.png[/IMG]

[size=3][b][color=silver]Install[/size][/color][/b]
*NMM*
0 - [b][color=orange]INSTALL [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065]SLEEKSTEEL REPLACER !![/url][/color][/b]
1 - Add [b][color=orange]Muscular Women - SleekSteel[/color][/b] to NMM, either by click on \"Download with Manager\" button or \"Add mod from file\" in NMM.
2 - Activate mod.
3 - Choose your installation type.
4 - Accept overwrite if prompted.
5 - Play.

*Manually*
0 - [b][color=orange]INSTALL [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065]SLEEKSTEEL REPLACER !![/url][/color][/b]
1 - Extract the archive.
2 - Open the folder corresponding to your install choice.
3 - copy and paste the Data folder inside your [b][color=orange]steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\[/color][/b]
4 - Overwrite if prompted.
5 - Activate SleekSteel_StandAlone.esp in your launcher, if necessary.
6 - Play o/


[size=3][b][color=silver]Uninstall[/size][/color][/b] 
*NMM*
Deactivate my mod in NMM

*Manually*
- Standalone_NordOrc
	Delete  [b][color=orange]Data\\meshes\\MW\\armor\\SleekSteel[/color][/b]
	Replace SleekSteel_StandAlone.esp by the original
- Standalone_AllRace
	Replace MW SleekSteel meshes in  [b][color=orange]Data\\meshes\\armor\\SleekSteel[/color][/b] by originals
- Replacer_NordOrc
	Replace Sleeksteel meshes by steel from Muscular Women - Armours in [b][color=orange]Data\\meshes\\MW\\Armor\\Steel[/color][/b]
- Replacer AllRace
    Replace Sleeksteel meshes by steel from Muscular Women - Armours in [b][color=orange]Data\\meshes\\armor\\Steel[/color][/b]



[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/3676/requirementss.png[/IMG]

[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8873]Muscular Women[/url]
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32521]Muscular Women - Armours[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065]SleekSteel Replacer[/url][/size]



[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img29/2729/creditsh.png[/IMG]
Bethesda : for this marvelous sandbox
ReflexShooter : for his nice work on Sleek Steel armour http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065


Licencing/legal
==============
Those armours are not from me, see licencing/permissions from orignal mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24065[/font]
author: ReflexShooter and Elmanouche

files.name: MW SleekSteel 1_0_0a
files.changelogHtml: Fixed error in package. Replacer nordandorc would't work
